backend/main.mo: Defines game backend types and logic including profiles, lobbies, matches, challenges, authorization, and creation of solo/multiplayer lobbies.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing styling, routing, components, and gameplay-related pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/google79d2180f87c8c2c7.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app in a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to set their display name and save it to backend.
Countdown timer component showing minutes and seconds with urgency coloring.
Displays players in a lobby with host labeling using terminal-styled UI.
frontend/src/components/game/TerminalPan: Implements an interactive terminal UI with command history, autocomplete, and scrolling output for challenge processing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header navigation, footer, and versioned branding wrapper around page content.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the single application version constant.
frontend/src/content/updates.ts: Defines the changelog entries for the Updates page with version metadata and change lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Wraps useActor to expose a simple readiness flag for when the backend actor is usable.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and logout handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLobbyAutoJoin.ts: Coordinates automatic and manual joining of multiplayer lobbies, tracking attempts, errors, and join state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations including profiles, lobbies, matches, and terminal command processing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining a cyber‑terminal theme, custom color variables, and CRT-style UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and loads the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with solo/multiplayer actions, lobby creation, authentication checks, and terminal‑style UI.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays global leaderboard and recent matches with authentication notice and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Manages lobby state, auto‑join, start/leave actions, and navigation into active matches.
frontend/src/pages/MatchPage.tsx: Runs the active match with terminal commands, challenge updates, auto‑join handling, and completion flow.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows final score, mode, and navigation options after a match concludes.
frontend/src/pages/SoloGamePage.tsx: React page that initializes and manages a solo game session, including lobby creation, match start, polling for readiness, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Displays a styled changelog page showing versioned updates pulled from static content.
frontend/src/utils/parseIcError.ts: Converts various IC and backend errors into user-friendly messages with specific handling for common failure cases.
frontend/src/utils/soloInitProgress.ts: Defines solo initialization phases, timeout logic, and helper messages for progress display.
frontend/src/utils/soloReadiness.ts: Utilities for determining solo lobby readiness and retrying with exponential backoff and cancellable delays.
Unwraps Candid optional values, returning the underlying value or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, typography, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, current state version, goals for a browser-based hacking game, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions. Serves as a centralized reference for build planning and troubleshooting.
